channel.title: [317] Create arrows on ground
channel.description:
Hey all,
I was trying some stuff out on my server, and noticed that arrows don't drop when using ranged. I searched the tutorial section for a tutorial on this (guessing more people have this problem), but couldn't find any.
Could anyone explain where I should look to add the arrowdropping myself, or point to a tutorial on this subject?
Regards, SirPali
